name: Ashwalker
movement: walks at a speed of 30 ft.
description: The Ashwalker is an undead creature with draconic traits, distinct for its blend of malevolent energy and elemental connections based on the dragon type that killed it.
memorable: Its ability to transform into an invulnerable energy form upon death makes it a unique and dangerous adversary.
goals: To wreak havoc and cause destruction, driven by its lingering malice from life.
relations: Related to dragons, as it embodies the elemental traits of the dragon that led to its death.
environment: Typically found in areas once inhabited by the dragons it emulates or in desolate wastelands.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and the poisoned condition; can unleash significant damage with its breath attack.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma make it ineffective in social situations.
attacks: Uses a slam attack dealing bludgeoning damage plus additional elemental damage based on its Breath Born trait.
most_powerful_ability: The Last Breath ability allows the Ashwalker to drop to 1 hit point instead of 0 and become invulnerable, transforming into elemental energy.
senses: Possesses darkvision to see in the dark up to 60 feet.
additional_information: Immunity to damage based on the dragon that killed it with the Breath Born trait.
Can deal elemental damage to any creature that touches it or attacks it in melee.
Relentless and does not need air, food, drink, or rest.
Draconic Breath is a powerful area attack that can significantly damage multiple targets.
Low intelligence limits its utility and strategic planning.
